title: The Last of Us Part II and Ghost of Tsushima Get New Dates - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.27.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about new dates for The Last of Us Part II and Ghost of Tsushima. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:03:02 - Housekeeping
Google Stadia Connect is happening tomorrow at 9am pt and we’re reacting to it live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Also tomorrow, it’s our second sponsored Predator: Hunting Grounds stream. Tuesday at 2 pm, Kinda Funny is going to hunt down the one, the only -- THE PREDATOR Al Tribesman on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Disnelyand Video Live Now
Today’s Greg’s birthday! Tweet @gameovergreggy and tell him happy birthday
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:43 - The Last of Us Part 2 and Ghost of Tsushima have received new dates! - Hermen Hulst, Head of Worldwide Studios @ PS Blog
00:09:25 - What do you think changed at Sony in making this decision? - Best Friends Q:Amiad (ah-mee-odd) Fredman
00:19:12 - Beware, Last of Us 2 Spoilers are in the wild - Mike Fahey @ Kotaku
00:24:15 - Do you think this changes the new LoU2 release plans? - Best Friends Q:Katie G
00:32:25 - WWE 2K Battlegrounds is this year’s WWE game - Christopher Dring @ GIBiz
00:41:10 - Is WWE 2K Battleground something that interest you or get you hyped? - BJ Bernardo (@bjbernardo10)
00:42:03 - Google abandons Stadia Base branding as it launches free tier - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:44:45 - There’s a new Stadia Connect coming tomorrow! - Chris Moyse @ Destructoid
00:49:40 - Bethesda is donating $1 Million toward Covid-19 Relief Efforts - Bethesda’s Blog
00:54:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:32 - What's up with this Mick Gordon DOOM Eternal Soundtrack and Bethesda/ID beef? - LordofPwn
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Blessing and Imran 
 0058:54 - Post Show
